pull.title: [23.x] guix: use `--build={arch}-guix-linux-gnu` in cross toolchain
pull.body:
This backports https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25861 to the 23.x branch, which fixes Guix building for `aarch64-linux-gnu` on aarch64 hardware. Fixing Guix building for this `HOST`, for the current release branch, seems like a worthwhile change, especially given more Guix builders are using aarch64 hardware. I thought I'd already backported this; noticed while building [sigs for 23.1rc1](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/guix.sigs/pull/380), which I started doing on aarch64.

Guix Build (aarch64, no `x86_64-apple-darwin` or `arm64-apple-darwin`):

events.message:
guix: use --build={arch}-guix-linux-gnu in cross toolchain

Technically we are always cross-compiling, so make that explicit.

Fixes: #22458.

Github-Pull: #25861
Rebased-From: 56e79fe683d36c1944e52326fae3bcc4cb7deec7

issue.title: guix: use --build={arch}-guix-linux-gnu in cross toolchain
issue.body:
Technically we are always cross-compiling when Guix building, so make that explicit. `{arch}-guix-linux-gnu` is not a triplet that should be used in any other capacity, but here it serves the purpose of ensuring, that by setting `--build` to something other than `--host/--target`, we are always cross-compiling (in the eyes of autoconf etc) when building our cross toolchains. It looks like `x86_64-linux-gnu` on `x86_64-linux-gnu` currently works because of the triplet canonicalisation, i.e `x86_64-linux-gnu` becomes `x86_64-pc-linux-gnu`, and GCCs configure thinking it's cross-compiling, whereas the same canonicalisation doesn't happen for `aarch64-linux-gnu` so we don't get a cross-compile when building on aarch64.

Fixes: #22458.

Guix Build (x86_64):
```bash
e590e67d2b151e7d079f50393c61cacf9e65f5e3fdddc10bffd5dbb59cd9f5e3  guix-build-56e79fe683d3/output/aarch64-linux-gnu/SHA256SUMS.part
```

events.body:

issue.title: [23.x] Bump version to 23.1rc2 & add release notes
issue.body:
Bump the version to 23.1rc2.
Regenerate the man pages.
Add historical 23.0 release notes.
Add WIP 23.1 release notes.

Changes since rc1:
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26474
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26522
